\FloatBarrier
```{r message=F, warning=F, echo=F, out.width='30%',fig.align='center',  fig.cap="\\label{fig:normal}Standard Normal Distribution"}
library(tidyverse)
x=seq(-3,3,length=200)
y=dnorm(x, mean = 0, sd = 1)

normaldata <- data.frame(x,y)

ggplot(normaldata, aes(x=x, y = y)) + 
  geom_density(stat="identity") +
  theme_classic() 
```
\FloatBarrier
